data.name: SMITE Almighty Archon Bundle
data.detailed_description:
All evil must be vanquished from SMITE!

The Almighty Archon Bundle unlocks the Exclusive Almighty Archon Zeus Skin. He and his angels will destroy all demonic forces on the Battleground. This bundle also includes the Storm Bringer Avatar and 400 Gems!

The Almighty Archon Bundle includes:
Almighty Archon Zeus Skin
Storm Bringer Avatar
400 Gems

data.short_description: All evil must be vanquished from SMITE! The Almighty Archon Bundle unlocks the Exclusive Almighty Archon Zeus Skin. He and his angels will destroy all demonic forces on the Battleground. This bundle also includes the Storm Bringer Avatar and 400 Gems!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Turkish, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Athlon X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8/10 64-bit (latest Service Pack)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.67 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or ATI Radeon HD 7950
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
